description: Implements an SONiC specific provider for sonic resources

recipes.vlan: Creates/deletes VLANs and adds (tagged or untagged)/delete port participation on SONiC devices.
recipes.interface: Sets the interface properties like admin status and speed on SONiC devices.
recipes.lag: Creates/deletes Port channel interfaces and set its properties like minimum number of links, addition and deletion of members and fallback on SONiC devices.
recipes.fdb: Creates and deletes static FDB entries on SONiC devices.

sonic/providers/vlan.description: Creates/deletes VLANs and adds (tagged or untagged)/delete port participation on SONiC devices.

sonic/providers/interface.description: Sets the interface properties like admin status and speed on SONiC devices.

sonic/providers/lag.description: Creates/deletes Port channel interfaces and set its properties like minimum number of links, addition and deletion of members and fallback on SONiC devices.

sonic/providers/fdb.description: Creates and deletes static FDB entries on SONiC devices.

long_description:
sonic Cookbook
 ============
 
 This cookbook provides a set of examples for configuring a switch running SONiC.
 
 Requirements
 ------------
 
 Chef 11.4.0
 
 Attributes
 ----------
 See the attributes/default.rb for default values. 
 
 default[:sonic][:providers][:vlan] =

- Provider for fdb
 
 Usage
 -----
 This is sample implementation of sonic provider for SONiC devices. Use this to configure basic switch functionality.  
 e.g.
 Just include `sonic` in your node's `run_list`:
 
 ```json
 {
 "name":"my_node",
 "run_list": [
 "recipe[sonic::vlan]",
 "recipe[sonic::interface]",
 "recipe[sonic::lag]",
 "recipe[sonic::fdb]"
 ]
 }
 ```
